glossary.CLV: Customer Lifetime Value — total predicted revenue from a customer over the entire relationship
glossary.CAC: Customer Acquisition Cost — cost to acquire one new customer
glossary.Bounce Rate: Percentage of visitors who leave after viewing only one page
glossary.Conversion Rate: Percentage of visitors who complete a desired action
glossary.Turnover Rate: Number of times inventory is sold and replaced in a period
glossary.NPS: Net Promoter Score — measure of customer loyalty and satisfaction
